K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:401b-14: tshig de smras nas ring por ma lon par de'i mod la bdud sdig can steng gi bar snang la sprin chen po 'khrugs par mngon par sprul nas sgra chen po'i nga ro phyung ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:403b-1: de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:403b-5: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang med pas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:403b-7: btul ba de ji lta bu /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:403b-11: ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du shes pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:404a-0: nye bar len pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang yongs su mi spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu ni sbyin pa'i @404a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:404b-5: btsun pa moonggal gyi bu chen po /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:405b-14: nyon mongs pa rnams na; mun pa'i spyod yul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:405b-15: shes rab kyi sgron mas mi snang ba snang bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:405b-16: nyon mongs pa rnams ni chom rkun dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:405b-19: srin po dang 'dra ste; tshul bzhin yid la byed pas brtags na gnas pa ma yin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:405b-20: nyon mongs pa rnams ni glags tshol ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:405b-21: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'phel ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:405b-24: smon pa med pa'i shes pas yid la 'jug par mi byed pas sus nyon mongs pa rnams 'di 'dra bar shes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-1: mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje zhing bdag med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-2: sems can med pa mngon sum du gyur pa na 'dul ba 'dzin pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-3: de ltar nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi 'dod pa bdud sdig can de la kun dris nas bdud sdig can gyis kyang de dag thams cad kyi don gtan la bab par bstan pas sems rangs par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-4: de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las bshad zin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-7: khyod kyang spobs par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-10: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-11: sdig can gyis lha'i bu mtshams bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-13: nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-16: rnal 'byor spyod pa rnam par grol ba 'dod cing 'khor bas skrag pa rnams la bsnyen pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406a-18: bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-0: stong pa nyid la so sor rtog cing sems can yal bar 'dor ba'ang bdud @406b kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-1: 'dus ma byas la so sor rtog cing 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su skyo ba'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-2: bsam gtan skyed cing bsam gtan las rnam par ldog pa tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-3: chos ston kyang chos nyan pa rnams la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-4: yon tan dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-5: sbyin gnas tshol zhing tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khro ba'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ston cing theg pa chen po'i gtam 'chab pa'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-8: zab mo'i gtam 'chab cing gtam sna tshogs ston pa'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-9: byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-10: rab tu brtson pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang sems can mi brtson pa rnams mngon par mi sbyor ba'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-11: dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog kyang byang chub kyi sems mngon du mi byed pa'ang bdud kyi las so; ;lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor dang ldan par gnas kyang sems can rnams lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:406b-12: nyon mongs pa ma lus par zad par tshol zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi nyon mongs pa rnams la smon pa'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-0: shes rab kyis rnam par dpyod cing snying rje chen po la dmigs pa mi 'dzin pa'ang bdud @407a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-2: thabs dang mi ldan par dge ba spyod pa thams cad kyang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod mi tshol gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-4: 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-5: mang du thos kyang gzhan gyis shes kyis dogs te chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-6: 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa'i zhal ta byed cing mang du thos pa mi tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-7: byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa skal pa mnyam pa rnams la mi bsten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-11: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa skal ba mi mnyam par dga' ba'ang bdud kyi las so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-12: gang gi tshe brgya byin nam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-17: khyim bdag gi longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-20: dbang phyug gi che ba nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe chos kyi che ba nyid dang ldan pa rnams la mi bsten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-22: bsnyen bkur mi byed pa 'di dag ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul nyi shu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la sdig can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-0: khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi @407b las 'di dag legs par bshad pa ni legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-1: legs so zhes bya ba byin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdud kyi las 'di rnams thos shing thos nas kyang rnam par spong ba de dag byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-7: 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-8: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-9: sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i khor dang skal ba mnyam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-12: gzungs rab tu thob pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-13: spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-14: mngon par shes pa shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-15: chos ma thos pa nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-16: tshe rabs tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-17: rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rab tu 'byung ba rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-18: dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-19: ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-20: thabs dang shes rab kyi shes pas sems can sdud cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-21: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-22: g-yo med cing sgyu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-23: phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-24: sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:407b-25: byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-1: bu mtshams bzang gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-3: khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba ni sdig can; khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-6: 'di la kho bos rnyed pa ci zhig legs par rnyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-11: mi gang 'byung po babs pa de ni mi de'i 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-12: de ni 'byung po de'i 'gyur bar blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-14: de bzhin du kho bo'ang 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs nas ston gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-15: 'di kho bo'i skyes bu'i rtsal du ni mi blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-18: khyod sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi sengge'i khri la 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-19: sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan zhing chos ston pas dga' bar ma gyur tam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-21: khyod kyis ni kho bo brgyan par mthong ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-22: kho bos ni bcing ba dam pos bdag bcings par shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-25: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bzod par gsol cig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408a-27: de nas 'jam dpal gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud kyis lha'i bu mtshams bzang la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @408b po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la bzod pa gsol mi dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-2: de dag la 'khrug pa med cing khro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-3: gang dag 'khrug cing khro ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol dgos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ci 'dra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ni rnam pa bcu gnyis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-10: rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-12: bcos ma ma yin pas bsam pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-13: khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-14: sems can thams cad la mi slu bas g-yo med pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-15: dbul zhing phongs pa yongs su skyob pas snying brtse zhing snying rje ba'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-16: ldog pa med pas ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-17: lta bar song ba dang bral bas stong pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-18: chos nyid la rton pas chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-19: bdag med pas zab mo'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-20: 'phags pa'i skye bo'i rjes su 'jug pas mthun pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-21: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mthun pas yang dag pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:408b-22: sems can thams cad rjes su srung bas ngo byed pa'ang med la mi mthun pa'ang med pa'i bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409a-1: chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i bzod pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409a-3: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409a-12: de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409a-14: bdud sdig can thong zhig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409a-16: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409a-22: bdag ni sus bcings mi shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409a-25: khyod ji ltar bcings pa med pa la bcings par 'du shes pa de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409a-26: sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409a-27: bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409a-28: mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409a-29: gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-0: rnam par shes pa med pa @409b la tshor ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-3: rnam par shes par 'du shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-8: bdag ni gang las kyang mi dgrol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-11: de bzhin du gang dag rnam par dgrol ba'ang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes yongs su shes pa me gtogs par gang las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-12: de dag yongs su shes pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-13: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs de bsdus pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-14: sdig can de'ang rang gi gzugs dang ldan par bdag gis shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-15: de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-17: khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas pa legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-21: 'di ni kho bo'i yul ma yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-22: 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yul du blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-23: de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-25: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gang du btsal bar bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:409b-27: lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-1: rnams nyon mongs pas gzir ba med na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-2: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-6: gal te sems can rnams na bar ma gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-7: sman pas kyang bya bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-9: gal te sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir bar ma gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-10: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-23: chos de dag spang ba'i don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-26: gang de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas chos bskyed pa de gang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-30: de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas chos gang yang bskyed pa'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-34: chos thams cad ni skye ba ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-35: 'gag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410a-37: sangs rgyas 'byung ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dvags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-0: byang chub @410b sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-2: gang dmigs pa'i lta bas chos gang la'ang kun tu mi spyod pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-4: ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-6: gang nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-11: gang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang 'dor la sems can thams cad kyang yongs su mi gtong ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-14: byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-16: ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin du sgrub cing sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims la 'god la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-17: lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub kyi sems kyang mi 'dor ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-20: byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-22: gang chos thams cad shin tu zad pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas sems can thams cad kyi gnod sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-24: tha ba spang ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi cho ga mi 'dor ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:410b-27: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-1: nam byang chub sems dpa' chos gang gi phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i chos de ni 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-3: de nyid shin tu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-4: sems can thams cad kyi le lo spang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus gces pa'ang mi 'dor ba na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-7: byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-9: nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par shes kyang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir yang bsam gtan byed pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-12: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-14: nam rgyu ba med pa thob par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-15: spros pa thams cad dang bral zhing sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang ba'i phyir shes rab kyi rnam par dpyod pa na ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-17: byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-20: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la gnas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411a-22: nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-1: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje la gnas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-3: nam chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-6: byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-8: nam chos thams cad la dga' ba'ang mi skyed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-9: mi dga' ba'ang ma yin pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-12: byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-14: nam chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral bar gyur pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-17: byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa zhes bya /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-19: nam chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur byung ba med par shes pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-24: nam byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ba na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-27: byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi mchog yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-29: nam chos thams cad gzung ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-30: gzhi med par shes pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:411b-33: byang chub sems dpa' go cha chen po bgos pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-1: pa; nam byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par thos na mi dngangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-3: skrag par mi 'gyur zhing go cha chen po mi 'dor ba na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-6: byang chub sems dpa' des pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-8: nam snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad ring du bsrings pa'ang ma yin la sred pa'i bag la nyal gyis nye bar bsnyen pa'ang ma yin pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-11: byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba yin; 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-12: nam bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pas lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-14: yid kyis gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-17: byang chub sems dpa' bka' blo bde ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-19: nam ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub cing tshig ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa na'o; ;lha'i bus smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-21: byang chub sems dpa' mthun par 'dzin pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-23: nam rang gi sems dang mthun pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis bsgo ba las mi 'gyur zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412a-24: sems can thams cad dang mthun par gnas pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-0: byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha shes @412b sheng khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-2: nam sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nang yang nye bar zhi la phyi rol tu rgyu ba la'ang rgyu ba na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-5: byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-7: nam chags pa thams cad la'ang spyod la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-8: chags pa thams cad la zhen pa'ang med pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-11: byang chub sems dpa' mdza' ba bsten pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-13: nam sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa na'o; ;lha'i bus smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-15: byang chub sems dpa' byas pa gzo ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-17: nam ji ltar byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzan pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-20: byang chub sems dpa' byas pa shes pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-22: nam theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi byed pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-24: ji ltar na; byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa nyung ba yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-26: nam rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi 'dod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams spang bar yang 'dod pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:412b-29: byang chub sems dpa' chog shes pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-0: nam 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi shes @413a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-1: pas chos gang yang mi len pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-4: byang chub sems dpa' ngoms pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-6: nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab la'ang gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-7: 'jig rten pa'i rgyu bas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dben pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-12: nam nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir brtson par yang snang ba na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rang dgar rang dbang can yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-17: nam zag pa med pa'i lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du snang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-18: ye shes kyis dbang byed kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-19: nyon mongs pas dbang byed pa ma yin pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-22: byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-24: nam bdag nyid kyang ma thos pa'i chos nyan cing gzhan la'ang ma thos pa'i chos thos par byed pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413a-27: byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-0: nam dmigs pa thams cad las 'byung @413b ba rab tu shes kyang chos thams cad 'phro bar yang mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-1: mi 'phro bar yang mi byed pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin; 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-5: nam gzhan dang 'brel ba'i rnam par rig pa mi skyed cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dben par yang rtog la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-6: rang gi sems kyi spyod pa la'ang mi lta zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-7: bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas sgrub pa snying por byed pa ma yin pa na'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-11: byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-14: nam byang chub sems dpa' thos pa thams cad kyang 'dzin la sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnams la'ang mtshungs par rab tu 'byed cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-15: sgra skad brag ca dang mtshungs par yang shes nas mngon par zhen pa med pa na ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-17: byang chub sems dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-18: de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-20: khyod kyis bshad pa'i don 'di sus kun shes par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:413b-23: gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-0: sngon gyi sbyor pa phun sum tshogs @414a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-1: pa; dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-2: dmigs pa med par spyod pa de dag gis kho bos bshad pa'i don 'di kun shes par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-4: de dag ci la mos par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-7: de dag zab mo la mos par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-8: lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa ni bsam pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-12: dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-15: nam dge slong 'jig tshogs la lta ba ngo bo nyid kyis bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam du sgom ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-16: gnyis su med pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid du mnyam par shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-19: sred pa las 'byung ba'ang tshol la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-22: sred pa las 'byung ba la so sor rtog pa ni ma rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-24: sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-25: rnam par grol bar shes pa na ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-27: dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-29: gzhan yang nam dge slong 'dod chags kyi mtha' la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414a-30: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang 'dod chags su shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-0: zhe sdang gi mtha' la zhe @414b sdang dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-1: zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang zhe sdang du shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-2: gti mug gi mtha' la gti mug dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-3: gti mug dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang gti mug tu shes pa na ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-5: dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-7: gzhan yang nam dge slong sdug bsngal yongs su shes par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-8: kun 'byung ba spong bar mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-9: 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-10: lam sgom par yang mi byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-11: sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rjes su rtogs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-12: sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la kun 'byung ba gang yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-13: sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la 'gog pa gang yang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-14: sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la lam gang yang med pa de ltar dge slong tshul bzhin la brtson pa ni chos gang yang skyed par mi byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-17: gang la skye ba med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-19: gnas pa med pa de 'dus ma byas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-20: 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin yang 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa sgom pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-23: dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:414b-24: de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415a-0: gdong mchi mas gang zhing mchi mas @415a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415a-1: brnangs bzhin du tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415a-2: gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de na bdud rnams kyi skabs med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415a-3: gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag gi bdud kyi las thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415a-4: yid la gcags bzhin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415a-5: de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415a-7: khyod kyis bshad pa'i don ji ltar bdag gis shes pa ltar na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415a-8: gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul zab mo 'di thos nas spong ba'i dge slong de dag gi rab tu byung ba med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415a-9: bsnyen par rdzogs pa med do; ;lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'dis skrag par 'gyur ba'i khyim de dag gi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415a-13: dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-0: ji @415b skad smras pa bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-4: dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-6: bzod pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-8: rang sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-9: lha'i bu 'od mang pos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-10: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-14: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-15: bdud 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-18: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-22: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:415b-23: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:416a-0: @416a *// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra bo dhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:416a-2: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-048-003:416a-3: skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa /
